==Ilkorin==
'''''esgar''''' is an [[Ilkorin]] word meaning "reed-bed".<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 356</ref>
===Etymology===
*[[Sundocarme|Root]] ESEK- (not given any meaning)<ref name=LR/>
===Examples===
*''[[Lake-town#Etymology|Esgaroth]]''<ref name=LR/>
==Elvish==
'''''esgar''''' means "shore", in an unspecified [[Elvish]] tongue.<ref name=VT46>{{VT|46a}}, p. 14</ref>
===Etymology===
*[[Sundocarme|Root]] SKAR<sup>2</sup> ("[?] stop, end; limid, marge")<ref name=VT46/>
===Examples===
*''[[Lake-town#Etymology|esgaroth]]''<ref name=VT46/>
